newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Nov 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Nov 21.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- An agreement on flexible work hours and geographic mobility may be signed at ailing state-owned bank Credit Lyonnais soon, that may avoid some 1,000 job cuts.
-- Chicago Mercantile Exchange to carry Matif's debt instruments outside European opening hours.
-- Thomson Multimedia workers demonstrate against planned takeover by Daewoo Electronics.
-- Businessman George Soros buys a 5.5 percent stake in appliance manufacturer Moulinex through three of his companies.
-- Government names experts to look into reasons of disappointing outcome of 20 years of state help to carmakers Renault and PSA.
